lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Hey Locke, over here!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Tai! Long time no see, my dear old friend!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: It's only been a day.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Really? Feels like it's been foreverrrr, like at least two minutes!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: That... is a significantly shorter amount of time. But you're technically not wrong?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anyways! Thanks again for helping with the case yesterday.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'm glad I could help! Although, I don't recall really doing anything, so I'm not super sure what you're talking about.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Nonsense! You helped out plenty, just like how Watson enhances Sherlock's genius intellect by emitting that unique Watson-like vibe no one else could!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Is that how it works?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I think I know a thing or two about detective-ing after six months on the job.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Can't argue with that! I don't do a lot of deducing in my line of work, so I'll take your word for it.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well, what you lack in deductive skills, you more than make up for with your stable editing job.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You were always talking about doing some kinda writing, and now look at you!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How'd that even happen anyways?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh you know. Someone I knew knew a gal, who knew a guy, and he recommended me to an editing company. Now here I am.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Oh please, it's just a bunch of stuff that happened.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No really! I kinda wish I could network like that.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: What about all of your peers and associates in your field?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: My what and what in my what now?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You know! There's that detective girl across the street, and that cop lady I see you with sometimes.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You mean my arch nemesis from OASCI and the evil witch that's always threatening to arrest me?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: OASCI?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Open and Shut Case Investigations.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's such a mouthful of a name, just as expected of my no-taste-having arch nemesis!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: As opposed to "Enloade Detective Agency"?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ......Anyways, what were you saying about them?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You always have so much going on. I could probably watch a show about you guys, Locke and Friends.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Haha, it's more like Locke and "Friends".

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well maybe you should try hanging out with them sometime! That seems like a thing you would do.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: What? Hang out with my enemies?! That's blasphemy!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well are they really your enemies?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: ...Ohh. I see what you're saying, you sly dog.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I should keep my enemies close right?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I'll gain their trust, learn their secrets, and then C R U S H THEM.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: ...I just meant that if you got along with them more, you could stop getting into trouble as often.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Actually, that just might work. I could learn a thing or two from your friend-making ways.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Err, yeah...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Anyways, do you want to try the donuts here?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: I'll treat you.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Tai, you are an angel. A blessing to this earth and my stomach.
